author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

Resolves #36492: `'-n':'1'` setting for the 0T workflow was overridden by the `PUDataSets` default, which was merged into the PU steps after the 0T workflow setup.

#### PR validation:

Output of `runTheMatrix.py -nel 11834.24` shows `-n 1` in all steps.
title: restrict number of events for 0T PU workflows
